Experiment.name: GPR 6 channel test
Experiment.description: Replicates main experiment from Gurney, Prescott & Redgrave (2001)

LogOutput.name: Striatum D1 output
LogOutput.target: Striatum D1 to GPi SNr Synapse 0 postsynapse

LogOutput.name: Striatum D2 output
LogOutput.target: Striatum D2 to GPe Synapse 0 postsynapse

LogOutput.name: STN output
LogOutput.target: STN to SUM STN Synapse 0 postsynapse

LogOutput.name: SUM STN output
LogOutput.target: SUM STN to GPi SNr Synapse 0 postsynapse

LogOutput.name: GPe output
LogOutput.target: GPe to GPi SNr Synapse 0 postsynapse

LogOutput.name: GPi output
LogOutput.target: GPi SNr to OUTPUT Synapse 0 postsynapse
